sections.heading: Core Functions
sections.content:
と has 4 main uses:

Complete listing - "and" (exhaustive) Accompaniment - "with" (doing together) Quotation - marks quoted speech/thought Natural consequence - "when/if" (automatic result)

sections.heading: 1. Complete Listing (And)
sections.content:
List all items in a group:

りんごとバナナ - "apples and bananas" 犬と猫 - "dogs and cats" 私と田中さん - "me and Tanaka"

Key: Lists ALL items (complete list).

Compare with や (partial list):

と = complete: A, B, C (only these) や = partial: A, B, etc. (and other things)

sections.heading: 2. Accompaniment (With)
sections.content:
Doing something together with someone:

友達と遊ぶ - "play with friends" 家族と食べる - "eat with family" 彼と話す - "talk with him" 先生と会う - "meet with teacher"

Pattern: [Person]と [Action verb]

sections.heading: 3. Quotation Marker
sections.content:
Marks direct/indirect speech or thought:

「行きます」と言った "(He) said 'I'll go'" 面白いと思う "(I) think it's interesting" 田中さんだと聞いた "(I) heard it's Tanaka"

Common verbs with と:

言う (say) 思う (think) 聞く (hear) 書く (write)

sections.heading: 4. Natural Consequence
sections.content:
Automatic/natural result (conditional):

春になると暖かくなる "When spring comes, it gets warm" ボタンを押すとドアが開く "When you press the button, the door opens"

Pattern: [Action]と [Natural result]

sections.heading: と vs や vs か
sections.content: | Particle | Meaning | Use | | -------- | ---------- | -------------------- | | と | and (all) | 犬と猫 (only these) | | や | and (etc.) | 犬や猫 (and others) | | か | or | 犬か猫 (one of them) |

sections.heading: と vs に for "To"
sections.content: 友達と話す - "talk with friend" (mutual) 友達に話す - "talk to friend" (one-way) 友達と会う - "meet with friend" (together) 友達に会う - "meet friend" (see them)

children.heading: Indirect Quote
children.content: 行くと言った "(He) said he'll go"

children.heading: Thought
children.content: 美味しいと思う "(I) think it's delicious"

children.heading: Hearsay
children.content: 雨だと聞いた "(I) heard it's raining"

sections.heading: Conditional と
sections.content:
Natural/habitual consequence:

この道を行くと駅がある "If you go down this road, there's a station" 夏になると暑くなる "When summer comes, it gets hot"

Not for intentions - use たら/ば for those.

children.heading: Tools/means (use で)
children.content: ✗ ペンと書く ✓ ペンで書く "write with a pen"

children.heading: Destinations (use に/へ)
children.content: ✗ 東京と行く ✓ 東京に行く "go to Tokyo"

children.heading: Listing
children.content: AとBとC パンと牛乳とりんご "bread, milk, and apples"

children.heading: Accompaniment
children.content: [Person]と [Verb] 友達と遊ぶ - "play with friends"

children.heading: Quotation
children.content: 「Quote」と言う 面白いと思う - "think it's interesting"

children.heading: Natural Result
children.content: [Condition]と [Result] 春になると花が咲く "When spring comes, flowers bloom"

sections.heading: Casual Speech
sections.content:
って can replace と in quotations:

Formal: 行くと言った Casual: 行くって言った "(He) said he'll go"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Complete list (all items) ✓ Doing together with someone ✓ Marks quotations/thoughts ✓ Natural consequences ✓ Different from や (partial) and か (or)

Related:

や (ya) - Partial List か (ka) - Or/Question って Casual Quotation
